section.custom-tags.name: Custom Context Tags
section.custom-tags.tooltip: Allow these custom context tags to be added to items in the game.
tag.category-artifact.name: Category Artifact
tag.category-artifact.tooltip: Custom context tag for items that are Artifacts.
tag.category-furniture.name: Category Furniture
tag.category-furniture.tooltip: Custom context tag for items that are Furniture.
tag.donate-bundle.name: Donate to Bundle
tag.donate-bundle.tooltip: Custom context tag for items that can be donated to the Community Center.
tag.donate-museum.name: Donate to Museum
tag.donate-museum.tooltip: Custom context tag for items that can be donated to the Museum.
